Here's how I like to do it.  I post what he attempts, you can 
intercept.  If you intercept his attempts (start your own post) 
halfway though, everything after that is null, and void.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> Watch your posting, if you want something to happen to Megatron, 
you 
> have to attempt to do it, not just do it. (aka moding) So, propose 
> an action, and i'll post accordingly. =)
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > Sunhawk grabbed Megatron and threw him into a position
> > to take the shots in the middle of his back.
> >
